statements: SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email_address FROM customer_contacts WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' OR email_address LIKE '%hotmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name,email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers JOIN campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT last_name, first_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id=100;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.campaign_name, cp.participant_id, cu.first_name, cu.last_name FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_participants cp ON c.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id JOIN customers cu ON cp.customer_id = cu.customer_id;

SELECT cu.first_name, cu.last_name, ca.start_date FROM customers cu INNER JOIN campaign_participants cp ON cu.customer_id = cp.customer_id INNER JOIN campaigns ca ON cp.campaign_id = ca.campaign_id WHERE ca.end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, e.email_subject FROM customers c JOIN emails e ON c.id = e.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, e.email_subject FROM customers c JOIN emails e ON c.id = e.customer_id WHERE e.campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, e.email_subject FROM customers c JOIN emails e ON c.id = e.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS email_count FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE contact_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY contact_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, opened, clicked FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, cs.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN campaign_targets ct ON cr.campaign_id = ct.campaign_id JOIN customer_segments cs ON ct.segment_id = cs.segment_id WHERE cr.opened = TRUE;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM customers c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.clicked = TRUE GROUP BY c.customer_name;
